sections.value: [AF]Flower Seeds

Some magic seeds for your magic flowers.

Aums, Cerublossoms, and Tarma will grow on standard farmland.

Desert Novas grow on sand.

Wakeblooms grow on water.
[AF]Ritual of Unspelling

Through a bit of tinkering, you have discovered that, by inverting the rune pattern of the Ritual of Arcana, and bombarding a spell with both raw mana, and aspected mana of the spell's opposite, you can destabilize the spell enough to cause it to collapse back into it's mundane components.

This ritual will require 4 Chimerite Crystals and 4 Mana Reserviors placed as can be seen on the next page, the Crystals must be attuned to the affinity opposite that of the spell and the Reservoirs must be full
The ritual will provide appropriate feedback should any of the requirements be unmet when attempting to start it. Complexity Foci are not returned.
[AF]Ritual of Treason

Tired of your current faction? Wishing you had picked a different one to ally with from the start? Take personal offense at irreversible choices in sandbox block game?

If you said 'yes' to any of these questions then this is the ritual for you! At the low cost of 40 of your current faction's marks, 2 foci dependant on your tier, 2 motes from your faction's ritual, and an object of great importance to your faction, you can now commit high treason!

The ritual recipe --> displays no items because every single reagent depends on either your faction or progression tier as described on the first page. Reagents will be displayed upon attempting to activate the ritual.
The next few pages show a completed ritual for each faction in glorious 128p.
Council
Demons
Fey
Undead
Disclaimer:

Your magic level will be reset to 29.
Your tier will be reset to 2
You will have to repeat progression to choose a new faction
The penalty for treason is death, your faction will very quickly dispatch assailants to mete out punishment.
[AF]Ritual of Catharsis

This ritual is used to cleanse various magical effects from the body and can purge most affinities and afflictions. The ritual will require four Chimerite Crystals placed as depicted and attuned to an affinity opposite your own. Reagents next page

The central reagent is a greater mote of your primary affinity. The ritual also requires four conditional reagents representing the affinity opposite yours, you can use any combination of the four items shown for each affinity on the right. This means you can use four of one item or some of each for an affinity.

Editor's Notes:
The conditional items required for each affinity are determined by tags.
The ritual reagent indicator will not cycle through the items in the tag but this is just a visual limitation.
After completing the ritual (no Manaweaving required) there will be a pillar of elemental particles and magic circle that you must stand in the middle of for the ritual to fully take effect.
[AF]Recycling Botched Plates

With the number of failed runescribing attempts piling up, I decided to try and get some reusability out of them.

By violently smashing the botched plates into some fresh clay I should be able to make a new blank plate ready to be fired.
[AF]Mana Monocle

This monocle, when worn, allows me to visualize the influence of certain magical objects (currently just the Warding Candle).

To activate simply right click a block near a Warding Candle with an empty hand while wearing the monocle. The nearest warding candle will have it's area of influence displayed as a large box.
Shift right click a block with an empty hand to turn this off.
